profile:
http://carpetcleaningglassellpark.com/
Developed in Glassell Park LA, we provide many carpet, rug and upholstery cleaning services to the customers of Glassell Park. Our philosophy is the fact that small particulars result in the significant distinction, therefore we attempt to provide each consumer superb service at an very affordable price. We operate either with residential and commercial customers, and no job is as well small for us. And our experienced, well-trained employees and friendly consumer service group mean you’re in excellent hands each and every stage in the road.
Our services contain steam cleaning, deep cleaning, shampoo cleaning and spot and stain removal. We utilize a combination of heavy-duty machinery and state of the art approaches, to take care of essentially the most unpleasant and bothersome stains. We can remove your carpet, rug or sofa or spills as a result of red wine, coffee, grease, corrosion as well as chewing gum. Plus the environmentally-friendly, organic cleaning items we use are not just gentle on your carpets but harmless for your kids and animals.
Eventually, we provide a 100% guarantee on our job, just to give you reassurance.
name: Hound Carpet Cleaning & Restoration Of Glassell Park Inc
